SystemColumn.Formula: COALESCE([Type of Insurance], "No type selected") & ": " & [Start Date] & " to " & [Expiry Date]

Column.Name: Insurance Type RecordID
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( ISBLANK([Insurance Type RecordID]), "Insurance type required" )

Column.Name: Record Changed
Parent Structure

Button.Text: Save Changes and Notify of Update

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL(ARRAY("EFormType", "RecordID"), "Contract", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Status] = 'Active' AND [Vendor RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor RecordID]))
TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula:
LET $subject := [Type of Insurance] & " Compliance has been updated";
RETURN ARRAY( $subject, [Type of Insurance], [Start Date], [Expiry Date], EBMS_GET_EFORMRECORD_URL([EFormType], [RecordID]), [Insurer], [Notes] )

ChangeFieldValues.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL("RecordID", "Insurance", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Vendor RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor RecordID]) & "AND [Type of Insurance] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Type of Insurance]) & "AND [RecordID] <> " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]), HASH("sort", "[RecordID] DESC") )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: ARRAY_LENGTH(DB_LOOKUPALL("RecordID", "Insurance", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Vendor RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor RecordID]) & "AND [Type of Insurance] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Type of Insurance]) & "AND [RecordID] <> " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]), HASH("sort", "[RecordID] DESC") )) > 0

Information.Text: Notifies the Contract Manager of all Contracts relating to this Vendor

Button.Text: Save Changes and Notify of Update

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL(ARRAY("EFormType", "RecordID"), "Contract", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Status] = 'Active' AND [Vendor RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor RecordID]))
TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula:
LET $subject := [Type of Insurance] & " Compliance has been updated";
RETURN ARRAY( $subject, [Type of Insurance], [Start Date], [Expiry Date], EBMS_GET_EFORMRECORD_URL([EFormType], [RecordID]), [Insurer], [Notes] )

ChangeFieldValues.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL("RecordID", "Insurance", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Vendor RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Vendor RecordID]) & "AND [Type of Insurance] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Type of Insurance]) & "AND [RecordID] <> " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]), HASH("sort", "[RecordID] DESC") )

Information.Text: Notifies the Contract Manager of all Contracts relating to this Vendor.

TextCriterion.Text: (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
-- Check if user is in Everyone or Read All WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is vendor WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE END
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( [To].[Vendor RecordID] = [To].[Vendor RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] = 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] ) ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers'
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $settings := DB_LOOKUP( ARRAY( "Reminder Enabled", "Reminder User Adjustable", "Reminder Recipients", "Resolve Method", "Relative Date",
"Reminder 1", "Reminder 2", "Reminder 3" ), "Settings - Contract", "[Reminder Enabled] = TRUE AND [RecordID] = 1 AND [Reminder Target EForm] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) );
RETURN
HASH( "Reminders Enabled", ARRAY_INDEX($settings , 1), "User Adjustable", ARRAY_INDEX($settings , 2), "Recipients", ARRAY_INDEX($settings , 3), "Resolve Method", ARRAY_INDEX($settings , 4), "Relative Date", ARRAY_INDEX($settings , 5),
"Reminder 1 Timing", ARRAY_INDEX($settings, 6), "Reminder 2 Timing", ARRAY_INDEX($settings, 7), "Reminder 3 Timing", ARRAY_INDEX($settings, 8) )
DB_LOOKUP( ARRAY( "Reminder 1", "Reminder 2", "Reminder 3" ), "Settings - Contract", "[Reminder Enabled] = TRUE AND [RecordID] = 1 AND [Reminder Target EForm] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) )

IF( OR( ISBLANK([Start Date]), ISBLANK([Expiry Date]), [Start Date] > NOW() ), "Inactive",
[Expiry Date] <= NOW(), "Expired",
"Active" )
